text: Ezɨ Joap kamaghɨn atrivim ikaragha ghaze, “Atrivim, nan gumazir ekiam, kɨ kamagh ifonge, Ikiavɨra Itir God, a gumazamizibar dɨbobonim damightɨ a bar ghuavanabogh, egh bar avɨrasemegham. Ezɨ atrivim, nan gumazir ekiam, ga uaning, gumazamiziba mengamin ingangarim, kar en ingangarim puvatɨ. Ezɨ nɨ tizimsua arazir kurar kam damuasava ami? Arazir kam ti osɨmtɨzim Israelia danigham.”
